text: um I mean I think a lot of a lot of
innovation just happens when you uh get
the government out of the way uh so a
lot of times when people talk about
encouraging Innovation uh what they end
up thinking about way too much is you
know some massive public subsidies for
some new chip manufacturing something
something and it's usually a complete
and total Fiasco because you get the
wrong types of people coming in the
wrong types of politically connected
businesses uh doing things that make no
sense because they're being subsidized
to do it um I think it's really
important to recognize that it's very
very difficult for the government to do
anything to encourage Innovation uh the
most important thing we can do is just
get out of our
way
